product.title: Our Equipment
product.description: The Element 5 Hex range of speakers has been designed from the ground up to deliver the highest possible volume and sound quality from a lightwight package with an incredibly small footprint. Not only do these speakers sound spectacular, but they also look the part, with a contemporary hexagonal styling to help distinguish your event audio from the rest. We are currently the only audio hire hire company officring this uniquely distinctive sound system.

items.title: HEX 68R
items.description: The HEX 68R is a game-changer in the world of speakers. This one-of-a-kind solution merges a point source and array into a single, sleek enclosure. Thanks to Element 5 Systems' innovative ribbon array design, the HEX 68R delivers breathtakingly clear and accurate sound that will capture the imagination of your audience. The speakers boast impressive features, including:
items.one: Wide dispersion for optimal sound coverage
items.two: Exceptionally flat mid-frequency response for natural sound reproduction
items.three: Superb high-frequency characteristics for clear and crisp audio
items.four: High sensitivity for powerful, impactful sound output

items.title: HEX RB218
items.description: The RB218 is a compact and lightwuight dual 18" reflex subwoofer delivering an abundance of warm and tight low end which is highly controllable using multiple cardioid configurations. This enables the client to effectively control sound overspill both on and off site.
items.one: Abundant Warm and Tight Low End: The RB218 delivers rich, full-bodied low-end sound that will enhance any audio setup.
items.two: Highly Controllable Sound: Multiple cardioid configurations allow for precise control of sound overspill, both on and off site, giving you complete control over your audio experience.
items.three: Extremely Low Distortion: The RB218 provides crystal clear sound reproduction, with minimal distortion, ensuring that your audio is always of the highest quality.
items.four: Small Footprint and Scalable: Its compact design makes it easy to transport and set up, and its scalability makes it suitable for events of any size.

items.title: LINEA RESEARCH AMPLIFICATION
items.description: The 44M and 48M Series amplifiers from Linea Research represent a major advancement in amplifier technology. With their unique audio performance and integration of intelligent DSP, they offer a level of sound quality and performance that is unmatched.
items.description2: In addition to this, they also utilise FIR (Finite Impulse Response) presets, which contribute to their exceptional performance. FIR presets allow for precise, accurate sound tuning, resulting in a more natural and lifelike audio experience. They eliminate the negative effects of traditional analog filters, such as phase shifting and group delay. As a result, the 44M and 48M Series amplifiers offer a truly immersive audio experience for all listeners.
items.one: Over designed high capacity power supplies

features.title: Other services we provide
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: It is also possible for us to source other Element 5 equipment which is not currently currently in our inventory. We can now also provide a considerable amount of Danley Sound Labs equipment for hire alongside a selection of up to date DJ and monitoring equipment. Working together with our partners, we can provide exciting talent including:

items.title: We are the Hex Project
items.thirdBulletPoint: Tailor made event package working with pur partners

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
